## add() function

Adds the x and y values of the two points and returns a new point.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function add(p1: PointXY, p2: PointXY): PointXY;
```

|  p2 | [PointXY](./util.pointxy.md) |  |

[PointXY](./util.pointxy.md)
